subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Didier Drogba is heading to Istanbul to play for Galatasaray, and a lot will be expected of the Champions League winner -- like leading the club to a victory over Schalke in this season's tournament.
